body_html:
There was an original tf.contrib.seq2seq which was moved to tf.contrib.legacy_seq2seq; and there were some functions in the new tf.contrib.seq2seq that were problematic and we decided not to continue supporting them in favor of the new OO-based API.
…

body:
There was an original tf.contrib.seq2seq which was moved to
tf.contrib.legacy_seq2seq; and there were some functions in the new
tf.contrib.seq2seq that were problematic and we decided not to continue
supporting them in favor of the new OO-based API.
